lics.sourcenote: THIS TEXT IS THE ORIGINAL SOURCE CODE. This is NOT a full styled and published dictionary. As such it can and will contain unfinished entries, unpublished entries, entries with objectionable translations, etc. If you find any errors or want to add more words, download the file, edit it, and send it back to mailto:divvun@samediggi.noand mailto:giellatekno@hum.uit.no. Please also note that the entries are not necessarily sorted, or could be wrongly sorted.

mg.lexicon: little houselike object on top of graves in the orthodox religion
вид лососёвых рыб из рода лососей

xg.x: Šiõǥǥ Rosttov da leklvaž Ođđ Eeˊjj!

xtg.xt: God jul og godt nytt år!
Hyvää joulua ja onnellista uutta vuotta!
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

tg.t: одинаковый; равный; такой же; тот же
пожалуйста; не стоит благодарности (в ответ на изъявление благодарности)

lg.note: unclear if this root can occur unbound

mg.lexicon: рыболовная застава, плетень поперёк реки для ловли лосося

etymology.note: Float on waterˈ; loan from Kar "kuploa" (data_id 1660, cogn_id 62) ?
Loan from BF, cf. Est "(ära) peita" (data_id 3311)
Probably loan, either from Scand or Fin
